strategy.description: The incremental sync strategy to use: keyset, offset, timestamp, step_size, or replay.

initial_id.description: Initial ID for step-size strategy (used when pagination/count is not supported).

step_size.description: Step size for step-size strategy (number of IDs to process in each batch).

max_id.description: Maximum ID for step-size strategy (safety limit).

buffer_hours.description: Buffer hours for replay strategy (goes back this many hours from last timestamp).
